ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Payroll_Training_Completed__c ))), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT( All_Open_Items_Addressed_and_Resolved__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Status_Onboarding_Products_Outside_MPSC__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( X2_Successful_PRs_w_Limited_Assistance__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Pre_Post_Audits_Complete_w_out_Issues__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Multi_State_EEs_Setup_Accurately__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Multi_State_EEs_SUI_Rates_Verified__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Client_Degree_of_Self_Service__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fields required : "2 Successful PRs...", "Status-Onboarding Products..." "All Open Items Addressed..", "Pre/Post Audits Complete..", "Multi-State EEs Setup Accurately?", "Multi-State EEs SUI Rates Verified?" "Client Degree of Self Service"
